TEXT.TITLE: TEXON ENERGY <TXON> IN TALKS ON ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Texon Energy Corp said it has entered into a preliminary agreement to purchase an 80 pct interest in a privately-held specialty plastics manufacturing company it did not name. Texon said completion of the acquisition is subject to the consent of banks and third parties and the acquisition would be made for promissory notes and common stock. Reuter
